Feed an Enchanted Golden Apple to a Breeze Chamber

Use a Cardboard Crate to dispose a Cardboard Package Item
§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.box_a: Fill a Brass Crate with Gold Ingots
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.even_:
Mine a Reinforced Deepslate using an Airtight Handheld Drill
§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.flywh: Run an Airtight Assembly Driver at the maximum level of power

advancement.createcraftedbeginning.glaci: Obtain every kind of ice cream

Seal all six openings of an Airtight Encased Pipe using Airtight Sheets

Attempt to place a bucket of Amethyst Suspension in the Nether

Fly to the world build height limit while wearing an Airtight Chestplate

Defeat a Breeze with an Airtight Cannon

advancement.createcraftedbeginning.wind_: Defeat any mob with an Airtight Cannon
block.createcraftedbeginning.airtight_en: When R-Clicked the opening face with an Airtight Sheet
When R-Clicked the sealed face with a Wrench
An Airtight Pipe supporting _full directional connectivity_. The seal of each opening can be _dynamically controlled_ with _Airtight Sheets_.
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.andesite_c: Andesite Crate can store a large amount of of identical items
However, contents cannot be added or taken manually
Andesite Crate drops itself and contents when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.brass_crat: Brass Crate has twice the storage capacity of Andesite Crate
Items in the filter slot specify what to store
Thus preventing unnecessary items from entering
Brass Crate drops itself and contents when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.sturdy_cra: Sturdy Crate has four times the storage capacity of Andesite Crate
Items in the filter slot specify what to store
Sturdy Crate can't store Shulker Boxes, Toolboxes, or other Sturdy Crates
Sturdy Crate drops itself with contents stored when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.cardboard_: Cardboard Crate can only temporarily store a single type of item
When attempting to store different items, the existing contents will be disposed
When storing identical items, any quantity that exceeds the capacity limit will also be disposed
Cardboard Crate drops only itself when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_p: Endpoints of an Airtight Pipe network can interact with a variety of gas containers
Any block with gas storage capabilities can be filled or drained
Powered by Airtight Pumps, the Pipes can extract gases from the environment
Airtight Pipes can connect two or more gas sources and targets
However, the Pipes will not connect to any other adjacent pipe segments
Powered by Airtight Pumps, the Pipes can transport Gases
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_c: One-Way Transport with Airtight Check Valves
Airtight Check Valves allow gas flowing in a single direction only
Gas attempting to flow from the opposite direction is blocked
A Wrench can be used to reverse the direction
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.smart_airt: Controlling Gas Flow with Smart Airtight Pipes
Smart Airtight Pipes can restrict gas types passing through
Right-click filter slots with Gas Canisters to mark or change filtered gases
Only matching gases are permitted to pass
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_p: Airtight Pumps works similar to Mechanical Pumps
But Airtight Pumps must be rotating with at least Medium rotational speed
And the Pumps affect pipes connected up to 32 blocks away
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_t: Airtight Tanks can be combined up to 3x3x4 to increase total capacity
Airtight Tanks can be used to store large amounts of gas
Pipe networks can push and pull gases from any side
However, gases cannot be added or taken manually
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.creative_a: Creative Airtight Tanks can be combined up to 3x3x4
Creative Airtight Tanks provide an infinite supply of gas
Right-click the tank with a Gas Canister to designate its gas type
Gas pipes can indefinitely drain the designated gas from it
Any gas piped into a Creative Gas Tank will be disposed
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.empty_bree: Right-click a Breeze with an Empty Breeze Cooler to capture it
Breezes can also be collected from Spawners and Trial Spawners directly
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.breeze_coo: The Breeze Cooler acts as a coolant source for blocks above it
Requires feeding low-temperature items to the Breeze Cooler
Can be automated with Mechanical Arms, Deployers, or Mechanical Pumps
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.breeze_cha: Breeze Chambers must be placed atop Airtight Tanks
The Breeze energizes gases in Airtight Tanks below it
Requires feeding food to the Breeze Chamber
Improper foods reduce duration and may cause the Breeze ill
Can be automated with Mechanical Arms or Deployers
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_e: Airtight Engines must be placed on Airtight Tanks, forming an Airtight Assembly Driver
Additionally, at least one Breeze Chamber and Residue Outlet must be placed...
...Alternatively, place more Breeze Chambers, Residue Outlets, Airtight Engines, or even Airtight Tanks
Generating Rotational Force via an Airtight Assembly Driver
Generating Stress requires fulfilling multiple conditions...
2. Breeze Chambers maintained in Gale state
This enables Airtight Engines to steadily generate Stress
Total generated Stress and rotational speed is evenly distributed per Airtight Engine
A Wrench can be used to reverse the direction
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.residue_ou: Residue Outlets must be placed on Airtight Tanks
Airtight Assembly Driver gradually generate residue while producing Stress
Untreated residue accumulation will degrade the Residue Level of the Airtight Assembly Driver
Additional Residue Outlets can be placed as needed
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.air_compre: Air Compressors can pressurize input gases
Every 10mB of gas is pressurized into 1mB of Pressurized Gas
Operates when sufficient Rotational Force is supplied
Higher rotational speed increases pressurization rate
But passive coolers degrade or melt over time
Breeze Coolers provide more durable and efficient cooling
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.tesla_turb: Tesla Turbines require a 3x3 space for placement
And can be oriented horizontally or vertically
Requires at least one Tesla Turbine Rotor to function...
...with up to 4 Tesla Turbine Nozzles attached laterally
Adjacent nozzles cannot occupy the same corner position
Nozzle placement determines the direction and capacity of Stress generated
Generating Rotational Force via Tesla Turbines
Generating Stress requires fulfilling multiple conditions...
1. Continuous high-volume gas input to the Nozzles
Mismatched flow directions reduce power level
Additionally, input gas type influences performance
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.portable_g: Airtight Pipes cannot directly interact with Airtight Tanks on contraptions
Similarly to Portable Fluid Interfaces, Portable Gas Interfaces enable direct gas exchange with contraptions
Their behavior mirrors Portable Fluid Interfaces exactly
Redstone power will prevent the interface from engaging
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.gas_inject: Injecting Gases with Gas Injection Chambers
Gas Injection Chambers inject gases into items on Depots or Belts below them
Gas must be supplied to the Gas Injection Chamber from above
Processing automatically initiates when items accept the gas
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_h: Airtight Hatches must be placed on gas containers
Right-click with a Gas Canister to load it into the hatch
"Input Only": Continuously fills canisters from connected gas containers
"Output Only": Continuously empties canisters into connected gas containers
"Stay Half": Maintains canisters at half capacity
...draws gas when below half, expels excess when above half
Right-click with a Wrench to retrieve loaded canisters
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.air_vent_p: Placed Air Vents automatically connect to adjacent vents
Use a Wrench to install Louvered Vents on Air Vents
Right-click with empty hand to open Louvered Vents
Only open Louvered Vents permit passage
Players can crawl through connected Air Vents
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.tag.crates: Crates can only store identical items, but have no stack limit
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.tag.gas_pi: Components used for transporting gases directly.
createcraftedbeginning.recipe.fan_freezi: Fan behind Breeze Cooler in Gale State
item.createcraftedbeginning.airtight_boo: Prevents _sinking_ into powder snow with immunity to _environmental_ and _fall_ damage. Consumes _gas from Gas Canisters_ in inventory.
item.createcraftedbeginning.airtight_can: Fires a corresponding_ wind charge projectile_ based on the _type of gas_.
A ranged weapon that fires _wind charge projectiles_. Consumes _gas from Gas Canisters_ in your inventory.
item.createcraftedbeginning.airtight_che: Activates _Elytra Glide Mode_. Right-click with an _empty hand_ while gliding to consume gas for acceleration.
When pressing Jump key in mid-air
Enables _creative flight_ and _mid-air gliding_, with immunity to _kinetic_ damage. Consumes _gas from Gas Canisters_ in inventory.
item.createcraftedbeginning.airtight_han: When holding L-Click or R-Click in attack mode
A tool for _area mining_. Consumes _gas from Gas Canisters_ in inventory.
item.createcraftedbeginning.airtight_hel: Prevents _oxygen depletion_ and grants immunity to _negative_ status effects (existing effects remain). Consumes _gas from Gas Canisters_ in inventory.
item.createcraftedbeginning.airtight_leg: _Deflects projectiles_ and grants immunity to _cramming_ damage. Consumes _gas from Gas Canisters_ in inventory.
item.createcraftedbeginning.gas_canister: A portable _gas container_ that provides a continuous supply of gas to gas-consuming equipment
A _gas container_ storing up to 4 Gas Canisters, providing a continuous supply to gas-consuming equipment with _highest_ usage priority.
createcraftedbeginning.gui.goggles.breez: It appears that the currently stored fluid coolant is _invalid_.
It appears that the Breeze ate _improper_ food.
It appears that the Breeze cannot _energize_ _%1$s_.
It appears that the Breeze failed to _output_.
createcraftedbeginning.gui.goggles.air_c: It appears that the Air Compressor failed to _output_.
It appears that the Air Compressor cannot _pressurize_ _%1$s_.
It appears that the Air Compressor is _not_ rotating with _enough_ _speed_.
createcraftedbeginning.gui.tooltips.airt: Fires a wind charge projectile that creates a Wind Burst
Wind Burst deals extra damage and increased damage to entities which have the Wind Charged effect
Wind Burst additionally applies the Wind Charged effect
Fires a wind charge projectile that creates a Wind Burst and ignites entities
Wind Burst deals extra fire damage and increased damage to entities with longer remaining fire duration
Wind Burst ignites entities for a longer duration
Fires a wind charge projectile that creates a Wind Burst and applies the Levitation effect to entities
Wind Burst deals extra magic damage
Wind Burst applies a stronger and longer Levitation effect
Fires a wet wind charge projectile that creates a Wind Burst
Fires a wind charge projectile that create Wind Bursts, dealing devastating damage to entities
createcraftedbeginning.gui.airtight_hand: Displays mining boundaries. Different colors indicate distinct block types.
Enables continuous attack against entities within frontal range while rotating.
Blocks matching filter cannot be mined. Mines any block if filter is empty or unmatched.
Allows breaking container blocks. <!> Warning: May cause disastrous consequences!
When enabled, certain blocks drop themselves when mined.
When enabled, block drops will be collected directly into the inventory.
When enabled, converts block drops to XP based on hardness. Excludes container blocks like Shulker Boxes.
When enabled, replaces liquids within mining range with air.
